name: CREEKMORE 20
notes:
It is likely that the CREEKMORE 20 & 22 came from the same mold and were intended mostly for MORC or mini ton handicap racing. None were built in significant numbers. Keel, rudder and rig details seem to a vary widely. Thanks to 'Barnacle Bill' for providing some corrections though information on all Creekmore's is sparse.
FRACTIONAL SLOOP RIG: (from an ancient and unreliable PHRF list.)
I: 25.25'/7.70m
J: 8.25'/2.51m
P: 27.33'/8.33m
E: 9.50'/2.90m
SA(100%):  233.97 ft2/21.74 m2
